title: [Large-scale] Graduate Students' Mathematics Academic Achievement Improvement Program through Contextualized Teaching and Learning

context.additional_context: Application of mathematical concepts through real-world problem-solving and emphasis on communication skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical problem-solving processes using real business cases with over 80% accuracy
Learners achieve 3+ points on formative assessments demonstrating the ability to contextually apply mathematical concepts in group discussions and presentations
Learners achieve at least 25% improvement in weekly quiz scores compared to pre-assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
